MOB docs

MOB

A mobile-focused, graceful and powerful front-end framework for faster and easier mobile web development, inspired by Twitter’s bootstrap.

MOB focuses on following scence：

Mobile Web Page

* Index Page
* Article Page

Mobile Web App

* Home
* Content
* List

Browser and device support

* Android 2.3+
* iOS 5+

We are not support mobile Firefox and Windows Phone because they are minority in the market. If market changes, then we will changes too.
